Broadband Router}} OEM Gemtek WX5525 (WX5525X_V00) [http://support.gateway.com/s/Manuals/Desktops/8509437.pdf Manual] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=91465 SparkLAN WX-6615 on the OpenWrt forums]
:Per this post, the device should be near identical to the TRENDnet TEW-411BRP vA, Sitecom WL-111, and the SparkLAN WX-6615 ==Images== File:Gateway WGR-200 angled.jpg|angled File:Gateway WGR-200 bottom.jpg|bottom and label File:Gateway WGR-200 back.jpg|back File:Gateway WGR-200 power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:Gateway_WGR-200_board_top.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Used PSU(s)== The included power adapter is a '''Delta''' ADP-10SB REV. B. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=Delta Electronics |model=ADP-10SB |revision=B |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.4 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |output_v=5 |output_a=2 |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |manuf_country=China }}
